portfoliowebp.title: Aim High Foundation
portfoliowebp.description: The Aim High Foundation has held many events to assist highly motivated students. I am proud to be a continuing participant in their cause by providing support in digital and print.

portfoliowebp.title: Stoughton Pipe & Welding
portfoliowebp.description: I have worked with SP&W for quite some time and have a great deal of respect for the trade. I also appreciate that SP&W confides in my expertise to maintain a lean and performant web presence.

portfoliowebp.title: Bob K Photography
portfoliowebp.description: Bob is an excellent photographer, but he is very modest as well. I am glad to have had the opportunity to build his site as he envisioned. In the end, we learned a great deal about each others' passion for photography and digital specializations.
